entities.name: room 423
entities.description: The room where the conversation is taking place. ("T HE UNKNOWABLE ROOM 423")

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy's name mentioned in the context of being followed by Kreacher and Dobby. (‘Well ... they’ve been following Malfoy for me’)

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher's name mentioned as a house-elf who has been following Malfoy. (‘Night and day ,’ croaked Kreacher)

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby's name mentioned as a house-elf who has not slept for a week. (‘Dobby has not slept for a week, Harry Potter!’ said Dobby)

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter's name mentioned in the context of being spoken to by Dobby. (‘Dobby has not slept for a week, Harry Potter!’ said Dobby)

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione's name mentioned as looking indignant. (Hermione looked indignant)

relationships.description: Kreacher has been following Malfoy night and day. (‘Night and day ,’ croaked Kreacher)
Dobby has also been following Malfoy for Harry Potter. (‘Well ... they’ve been following Malfoy for me’)
Harry Potter is being spoken to by Dobby. (‘Dobby has not slept for a week, Harry Potter!’ said Dobby)
Kreacher describes Malfoy's features and manners as being like those of his mistress. (‘Master Malfoy moves with a no bility that befits his pure blood,’ croaked Kreacher)
Dobby describes Malfoy as a bad boy. (‘Draco Malfoy is a bad boy!’ squeaked Dobby angrily)
